book.dialogue:
"Hello Peter, just woke up? You're in jail for life. You may not remember why but that doesn't matter right now. Enclosed in this book is the key to your cell, tread carefully..."
Player obtained cellkey

MobMember.dialogue:
"Ptts hey stupid, I'm part of the gang WreyTay. You still owe us more favours. In return for your continued loyalty, we will protect you. Your first task is to deliver this package to the prisoner Trippie Maroon on the top floor"
Player obtained small package 1.1

Rainbow.dialogue: "can't believe I went 11/11 and now I'm here"

TheGambler.dialogue: "You get some cards and a dice and I'm down to gamble with you"

Prisoner.dialogue: "I've been arrested 7 times, I know that sounds like quite a lot but three of those times were for vandalism"

IllPrisoner.dialogue: The prisoner looked incredibly pale and frightened

TrippieMaroon.dialogue:
"Yo, WayTay sent you? Pass that here."
Trippie Maroon opened package
"Yes! I needed this... Hey, if you get bored, talk to me again yeah." 1.2

"You got bored quick, there is this guy with rainbow hair in this block I hate He has been playing pranks on me for weeks now, I want to poison him. The dinner lady has the worst smoking habit this side on the ocean and you can trade her cigarettes for pretty much anything. Take these and buy me some laxatives"
Player obtained 5 cigarettes 1.3

PlacementApplication.dialogue:
"I strike fear into the hearts of everyone knows my name... My name is Placement Application"
Player felt a shudder down their spine

Spades.dialogue:
"hey man take these, I don't want them anymore, I need to stop gambling"
player obtained playing cards

Loony.dialogue:
"Have you heard the rumour that you can hear screams in the basement at midnight?"
Player found this disturbing"

APrisoner.dialogue: "Leave me be man, I don't want any problems today"

DinnerLady.dialogue:
"Today we are serving our special of sardines and sadness... Unless you have something to trade?"
Player spends 5 cigarettes Player obtained laxatives 1.4

Biggie.dialogue: "I can't believe I'm eating this crap"

AnotherMobMember.dialogue: "I miss having fresh air and the peep show"
